snippet: Relatives of Sept. 11 victims as well as police officers and firefighters who survived the attack on the World Trade Center gathered in Brooklyn to watch the trial at Guantánamo Bay.
abstract: Relatives of Sept 11 victims as well as police officers and firefighters who survived the attack on the World Trade Center gather in Brooklyn to watch the arraignment proceedings of the military tribunal at Guantanamo Bay; as defendants repeatedly disrupt the courtroom, some relatives seethe.
lead_paragraph: Relatives of Sept. 11 victims as well as police officers and firefighters who survived the attack on the World Trade Center gathered in Brooklyn to watch the trial at Guantánamo Bay.

headline.seo: Families Watch 9/11 Case At Guantánamo Via Video
headline.main: Via Video Feed, Families Watch 9/11 Case and Seethe
headline.print_headline: Via Video Feed, Families Watch and Seethe
